testcase.name: Add the searched product in the bag and proceed to checkout
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenCart Landing Page.....................................passed When user searched with short name Tom and extract actual name of the product.passed And added "3" items of the selected product to the cart.....................passed Then user proceeds to checkout and validate the Tom items in checkout page..passed And Verify if user has ability to enter promo code and place the order......passed
